game.name: Pillow City Zero Zombie Outbreak
game.description:
Pillow City Zero Zombie Outbreak is a brand new action-packed game which is going to take you to a City where a number of blood-thirsty zombies are waiting for you. The name of this city is Pillow where you have to help Emma to accomplish all the assigned tasks and spot the secret serum. She trusts you a lot, so prove her right by showing your intense fighting skills. You will see many evil zombies walking around in this free online RPG game, which is basically set in a surprising dystopian future. 

Try to reach the place as soon as possible since here a beautiful nurse has been stuck in a secret research facility in an apartment. The problem is that the wicked zombie experiment brings into action there to restrict her from reaching out the truth. A big tragedy has just begun. And, you are her only hope to help her find a way to come out of that situation in this cool zombie game. Come into action fast and help Emma to take the serum as fast as you can. 

The entire path is full of challenging obstacles and life-threatening tricks. She is not even aware of what she would encounter on her way while moving towards her goal. Play this first-rate action game for free in any modern browsers! The controls of this one of the best adventure games for boys include S to cover, E to interact, as well as Use A and D to move. Apply your mouse to select and attack your rivals! All the best to make your win in this easy-to-play fighting game!
